document.full_text: elijah david traipsed the 55 km in plastic sandals from his home in guadalcanal province to the only gold mine in solomon islands, hoping to find work that may transform his life and that of his south pacific island nation, for better or perhaps worse.
document.title: solomons' gold mine set to reshape south pacific nation
lines_and_colors: elijah david traipsed the 55 km in plastic sandals from his home in guadalcanal province to the only gold mine in solomon islands, hoping to find work that may transform his life and that of his south pacific island nation, for better or perhaps worse.
